Good and relaxing game, it's mind twisting, but very fun

Easily the game that has had the most impact on me. When I first played it, I was in awe at how good it was. The story, the soundtrack, the puzzles, the twists and turns--they are all SO GOOD! Whenever I'm recommending video games to someone who has never gamed before, Portal 1+2 are my first recommendations. One has truly not lived life until they have played this game.

Jogo extremamente divertido, √≥timo jogo de puzzle pra ficar quebrando a cabe√ßa, hora estimada de jogo: minimo entre 5 e 7 horas, comprei o jogo em promo√ß√£o de natal/fim de ano, ent√£o n√£o sei dizer qual √© o pre√ßo real, mas pelo fato do jogo ser antigo, acredito ser um pre√ßo bem baixo, mesmo se n√£o for, ainda recomendo, enfim, aqui ta algumas observa√ß√µes abaixo

Pr√≥s do jogo: Vai de f√°cil a dif√≠cil, Horas longas e incriveis de jogo, gr√°ficos √≥timos, nunca vi bugs, tem co-op e online, m√∫sicas que combinam na hora certa e s√£o √≥timas, diversas conquistas que tem que liberar no jogo normal e co-op/online, barato (acredito eu, mas vale a pena), 3 vezes maior que o primeiro jogo, tem cartas colecion√°veis.

Desvantagens: Loadings um pouco demorados (talvez isso varie entre pcs), n√£o tem pt-br mas tem pt-pt (Portugu√™s de Portugal), apenas um final (pra mim isso n√£o √© t√£o ruim, j√° que o jogo √© longo)

Amazing Game, Great Story Line, Keeps you entertained just enough so you don't get bored, never too frustrating, except for maybe a couple tricky test chambers. Overall, definitely worth the play-through. To this day my favorite game of all time.

One of the best single player games I have every come across. Great story and fun game play that is fun and challenging. The co-op mode is also very good, with less story driven components more focused on teamwork. 10/10 would reccomend
a classic, hours of fun and still worth it even after a decade

On the winter sale this is crazy cheap (you can pick up both portal and portal 2 in a bundle for about ¬£3). If you like puzzles then this is a must-buy. Not only are the puzzles good, so are the characters. It looks so good its hard to imagine this came out around 10 years ago.

Not only does it have a single-player story, there's also a co-op mode (which is a completely separate story) which is great to play with a friend.
10 years later, this game still feels like it has not aged a day.

El Portal 2 es una secuela incre√≠ble en cuesti√≥n de Historia explica m√°s sobre Aperture Sciencie y Glados y un poco del creador de Apertur Science, algunos puzzles son de verdad complicado pero si vienes del portal 1 la mayor√≠a del juego te resultara pan comido solo es cuesti√≥n de pensar, con el personaje Wheatley pues es un gran personaje tanto como Villano y aliado, este juego nunca se me ha bugeado en lo que he jugado la interfaz es llamativa y los personajes en general est√°n bien desarrollados el jefe final resulto ser muy desafiante usaron lo mismo del Portal 1 solo que a√±adiendo mec√°nicas del Portal 2 y dificultaron un poco el jefe final aunque nos dan la misma cantidad de tiempo del portal 1 para derrotar al jefe final este jefe final resulto ser m√°s desafiante que el del portal 1
‚ÄúThe first person to prove that cow‚Äôs milk is drinkable was very, very thirsty.‚Äù

This game is so much fun after you get through the first part! I enjoyed exploring and messing with everything in the new puzzles and the story is so interesting too! Definitely a step up from Portal 1, give it a try if you haven't!

On a side note this game makes me want to replay it already and not just because I was playing offline mode and steam didn't count my achievements.
